name: Unearth (itch)
description:
Unearth is a cheeky little digging game where you collect gold on your descent to the bottom of the level.  It's short and sweet, but it comes with three difficulty modes that evolve the gameplay from a simple platformer to an intense puzzle challenge.  Give it a try!

(This game was made in two weeks for Awful Winter Jam 2018, and won the Game of the Jam award!  You can check out the jam page here: http://www.awfuljams.com/winter-2018/games)

(Furthermore, if you like the game's soundtrack and would like to download it to enjoy separately, you can do so here: https://ultigonio.bandcamp.com/album/unearth-ost )
